# functionExplorer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

Download development version from GitHub:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("WelcomeToMyVirtualHome/functionExplorer")
```

To run:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
functionExplorer::run_app()
```
